Introduction

Lee Jae Hwan, popularly known as Ken, is the main vocalist of the boy group VIXX under Jellyfish Entertainment. He has performed in many musicals and also acted in the drama Boarding House no. 24 (2014) and the web-drama Tofu Personified.

On May 20, 2020, Ken made a solo debut with his first solo mini album "Greeting" prior to his enlistment.

On July 17, 2024, Ken took to social media to announce that he joined a new agency, S27M ENTERTAINMENT.
